values: 说话；说；讲；讨论；谈论；商谈；洽谈（通常指重大的事）；（用某种语言）讲；说；谈话；讲话；说闲话；供出消息
洽谈；交谈；会谈；谈话；演讲；谈判；磋商；商讨；专题报告；讲座；座谈会；闲话；闲言碎语；传言；空话；吹牛；夸夸其谈

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 说话的，多嘴的；有表情的
说话的人；健谈者；空谈者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指一般的发言或讲话，可以是事先准备的，也可以是即席的。
常指在特殊场合，辞藻华丽，形式庄重，旨在激发听众感情的正式演说。
正式用词，指在庄严隆重的场合作精心准备的演讲或正式演说。
一般是指下级给上级或负责人给委托机关的书面或口头报告。
常用词，强调非正式讲话，讲话方式一般较为自由。
较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
侧重于说话动作的本身，着重说话的能力而不在内容，可以是长篇大论的演讲，也可以是三言两语的交谈，甚至指简单的开口发声说话。
最普通常用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的内容。
普通用词，指把某事告诉或讲述给某人听，口语或书面语均可用。
着重说话的行为，常指声音的使用，突出用噪子发声。
普通用词，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，可指单方面较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活动作而不侧重内容。
一般用词，指两个或更多人互相交换意见的交谈。
指熟人之间非常随便的交谈，强调谈话的亲密和非正式性。
普通用词，可与conversation换用，指正式交谈。

word_group.brief_definition: 对...说话；责备；对某人谈话
吹捧；议论起来了, 畅谈, 大胆讲
说行话, 三句话不离本行(尤指当着外行的面)
郑重其事地谈, 严肃认真地谈
言之凿凿, 侃侃而谈

bilingual.source: He uses it to talk to his friends.
Try to talk to all of your classmates.
Students will talk to their teachers on the Internet.
bilingual.target: 学生们会在网上和老师交谈。

bilingual.source: They were happy to talk to the interested audience.
bilingual.target: 他们很乐意与感兴趣的观众交谈。

bilingual.source: Americans look each other in the eye when they talk.
bilingual.target: 美国人交谈时会看着对方的眼睛。

bilingual.source: The robot is controlled by the teacher and can move around the classroom and talk with the students.
bilingual.target: 机器人由教师控制，可以在教室里移动并与学生交谈。

bilingual.source: Other people, including some English speakers from the UK and the US, were happy to talk to them.
bilingual.target: 其他人，包括一些来自英国和美国的英语使用者，很乐意和他们交谈。

bilingual.source: But they were happy to try, and other people, including some English speakers from the UK and the US, were happy to talk to them.
bilingual.target: 但他们很乐意尝试，其他人，包括一些来自英国和美国的英语母语者，也很乐意和他们交谈。

list.abstract: TALK，全名为TALK全球社会创新大会，是由21世纪经济报道主办。围绕社会发展、扶贫、社会企业及微型金融等话题，以“一对一跨界对话”为主体，邀请全球在政治、经济、学术、慈善等领域的嘉宾分享其创新见解。
talk，英语单词，名词、动词，作名词时意为“谈话；谈判；（非正式的）讲话；报告；空谈；谣言；话题；说话的方式”，作动词时意为“说话；谈论；谈心；谈判；（用某种语言）讲；说服；泄露秘密；议论；讲的是；说闲话；供出消息”。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you believe how lame this is? I'm sorry, I don't believe contestants are allowed to talk to each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的是太丢脸了。你能相信这有多烂吗？抱歉，我想参赛者不该交谈。

yingyinNormal.en: In the summer, it's directly in the path of a cross breeze created by opening windows there and there. It faces the television at an angle that isn't direct, so he can still talk to everybody, yet not so wide that the picture looks distorted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而在夏天，这个位置又正好处在由这个和那个窗口之间对流所产生的微风之中，这儿的角度并不是直接面朝电视所以他还能跟所有人交谈，同时又不会太偏导致画面失真。

yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.zh: 但是他确实能跟海豚唠磕。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a woman. So talk to her.

yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我们晚点再聊，脱线

yingyinNormal.en: You can't talk to me like that.

yingyinNormal.zh: 阿诺德？阿诺德，我们得谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Juli, I gotta talk to you. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 朱莉，我要和你谈谈。什么?
菲比! 好吧，我们在外面谈。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 商谈; 谈判; 谈论

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 正在谈话的；会学人语的；富于表情的

word_family.mean: v. 谈话；交谈；说话；谈判；说服；议论；谈心；商讨；责备；彻底地讨论

sense_info_list.en: say words aloud, or speak to someone; a conversation or discussion

examination_example.sentence: Some people like small <highlight>talk</highlight> in a meeting before digging into important matters, while others are more straightforward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人在会面时喜欢先闲聊，再深入探讨重要问题，而有些人则比较直接。

examination_example.sentence: Next time you <highlight>talk</highlight> with someone who takes a stand, ask them to give you a reason for their view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下次你和表明立场的人交谈时，请他们给你一个持该观点的理由。

examination_example.sentence: It's a problem all of us face; you have limited time with the person that you want to <highlight>talk</highlight> with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个我们所有人都会面临的难题：你和你想要交谈的人在一起的时间有限。

sense_info_list.en: formal discussions or negotiations over a period
sense_info_list.zh: 商谈; 谈判; 谈论

examination_example.sentence: Older generations often <highlight>talk</highlight> about their degree in the present and personal tense.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老一辈人经常用现在时态和个人时态谈论他们的学位。

examination_example.sentence: There were goals, there were strategies, there were objectives, but we didn't <highlight>talk</highlight> about energy; we didn't <highlight>talk</highlight> about passion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会使用“目标”、“策略”、“目的”（这样的词汇），却不会谈及“干劲”，也不会谈及“激情”。

examination_example.sentence: When the government <highlight>talks</highlight> about infrastructure contributing to the economy the focus is usually on roads, railways, broadband and energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当政府谈及有助于经济发展的基础设施时，重点通常是公路、铁路、宽带和能源。

sense_info_list.en: words that are spoken, but without the necessary facts or actions to support them

examination_example.sentence: The idea that "housing crisis" equals "concreted meadows" is pure lobby <highlight>talk</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “住房危机”等于“把草地浇筑上混凝土”的观点纯粹是游说团体的空谈。

sense_info_list.en: to persuade sb. to do or not to do sth.

examination_example.sentence: They need to be <highlight>talked</highlight> into it, or if they're teenagers, threatened with complete removal of all electronic devices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们需要被说服（去做家务），或者如果他们是青少年的话，还需要以“彻底切断一切电子设备”为威胁。

sense_info_list.en: a speech or lecture on a particular subject
have the power or ability of speech
the subject people are talking about
reveal secret or confidential information; betray secrets
stories that suggest a particular thing might happen in the future
to talk about a person's private life
to say things that are/are not sensible

word_usage.usage:
表示“说，讲”时：
talk用作不及物动词时，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，强调说话的动作而非内容，用作及物动词时，宾语多为nonsense、business等。
say是普通用词，指用语言表达思想，侧重于所说的具体内容，通常用作及物动词。
speak用作不及物动词时，侧重说话的动作而非内容，用作及物动词时，其宾语常为某种语言。talk用作不及物动词时，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，强调说话的动作而非内容，用作及物动词时，宾语多为nonsense、business等。
tell指直接给某人讲述或以间接的方式转述某事，有时有嘱托、命令之意，常后接双宾语或复合宾语。
talk常指“讨论/商谈”重大的事；discussion常指人们为达成某决定而就某事进行讨论；conversation通常指私下的或非正式的交谈、谈话。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指教授等做的教育性或学术性的演讲。
指政治家等重要人所做的发言、演说。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 演讲; 会议; 作报告

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吹捧；议论起来了；畅谈；大胆讲

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话的人；健谈者；空谈者
adj. 健谈的；爱说话的；多嘴的

word_family.mean: v. 谈话；交谈；说话；谈判；说服；议论；谈心；商讨；责备；彻底地讨论

sense_info_list.en: say words aloud, or speak to someone

examination_example.sentence: Thus, it's important to communicate clearly when <highlight>talking</highlight> about complex science subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，在谈论复杂的科学话题时，清晰地交流是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: Today, I'm <highlight>talking</highlight> to the renowned botanist, Jane Forster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，我要和著名的植物学家简·福斯特谈话。

examination_example.sentence: They're the areas that you look at when you're <highlight>talking</highlight> to someone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你和别人交谈时，它们是你注视的区域。

examination_example.sentence: I have the computer and FaceTime, which I <highlight>talk</highlight> with my family on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我有电脑和FaceTime可以和家人聊天。

sense_info_list.zh: 演讲; 会议; 作报告

sense_info_list.en: formal discussions or negotiations over a period

examination_example.sentence: We strongly intend to continue this dialogue, including <highlight>talks</highlight> with Greenpeace, to discuss improvements based on the latest scientific data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们强烈希望继续这一对话，包括与绿色和平组织的对话，讨论基于最新科学数据上的改进。

word_usage.usage: talk作名词“交谈，聊天”时，常用于单数形式，可与不定冠词a连用。
talk后不可接从句作宾语，但可接“of doing”形式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话的人；健谈者；空谈者

word_family.mean: v. 谈话；交谈；说话；谈判；说服；议论；谈心；商讨；责备；彻底地讨论

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对...说话；责备；对某人谈话

sense_info_list.en: say words aloud; or speak to someone

examination_example.sentence: It might be they have to <highlight>talk</highlight> to other students in the class to help get an answer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能得和班上其他同学商量来帮他们找到解决办法。

examination_example.sentence: Never afraid to <highlight>talk</highlight> up his own accomplishments, a boastful Creme made a fortune as wealthy families with social ambitions invited him to their kitchens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从来不怕谈论自己的成就，当一个有社交野心的富裕家庭邀请他去厨房时，自夸的 Creme 发了大财。

examination_example.sentence: Post wants to make clear that she's not <highlight>talking</highlight> about legal rights, but rather personal preference.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Post 想说明，她说的不是法律权利，而是个人喜好。

sense_info_list.en: formal discussions or negotiations over a period

examination_example.sentence: One of the Mothering Justice organizers went to the office of a state representative to <highlight>talk</highlight> about the lack of affordable childcare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “母亲正义”的一名组织者去了一名州代表的办公室，讨论缺乏负担得起的儿童保育服务的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Of course, sons and daughters want to <highlight>talk</highlight> to the administrators and residents and other families, and do everything possible to fulfill their duties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，儿女们想与管理人员和居民以及其他家庭交谈，并尽一切可能履行职责。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Talk</highlight> to his boss in person first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 先亲自和他的老板谈谈。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn from the <highlight>talk</highlight> about today's Americans?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从今天美国人的谈话中学到了什么？

word_usage.usage: talk后不可接从句作宾语，但可接“of doing”形式。
talk作名词“交谈，聊天”时，常用于单数形式，可与不定冠词a连用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 说话; 谈话; 交谈

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 正在谈话的；会学人语的；富于表情的
adj. 健谈的；爱说话的；多嘴的

word_family.mean: v. 谈话；交谈；说话；谈判；说服；议论；谈心；商讨；责备；彻底地讨论

sense_info_list.zh: 说话; 谈话; 交谈

examination_example.sentence: Today I'll <highlight>talk</highlight> about how to improve your pronunciation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天我将谈谈如何改善你的发音。

examination_example.sentence: Did you <highlight>talk</highlight> to him?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你和他谈过了吗？

examination_example.sentence: What are the speakers <highlight>talking</highlight> about?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 演讲者在谈论什么？

examination_example.sentence: You could come over and have a <highlight>talk</highlight> with us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以过来和我们谈谈。

examination_example.sentence: "Almost every great love story and each big business deal begins with small <highlight>talk</highlight>, " he explains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “几乎每一个伟大的爱情故事和每一笔大生意都是从闲聊开始的。”他解释道。

examination_example.sentence: The key to successful small <highlight>talk</highlight> is learning how to connect with others, not just communicate with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成功闲聊的关键是学会如何与他人建立关系，而不仅仅是与他们交流。

examination_example.sentence: M: Many experts have given <highlight>talks</highlight> here that have focused on the medical care and the development of public services for senior citizens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多专家在这里发表了演讲，聚焦于老年人的医疗保健和公共服务的发展。

examination_example.sentence: If so, come early to the <highlight>talk</highlight> at 7.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果是这样，请在7点钟早点来参加讲座。

examination_example.sentence: Our monthly <highlight>talks</highlight> start at 19: 30 on the first Thursday of each month except August.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的每月讲座在除了八月以外的每个月的第一个星期四的19:30开始。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 演讲; 会议; 作报告

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 正在谈话的；会学人语的；富于表情的
n. 说话的人；健谈者；空谈者
adj. 健谈的；爱说话的；多嘴的

word_family.mean: v. 谈话；交谈；说话；谈判；说服；议论；谈心；商讨；责备；彻底地讨论

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对...说话；责备；对某人谈话

sense_info_list.en: say words aloud, or speak to someone

examination_example.sentence: Nurses sometimes <highlight>talk</highlight> with patients and their family members to make them feel better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 护士有时会与患者及其家人交谈，让他们感觉好些。

examination_example.sentence: They like <highlight>talking</highlight> on the phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们喜欢打电话。

examination_example.sentence: What are the two speakers mainly <highlight>talking</highlight> about?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两位演讲者主要谈的是什么？

sense_info_list.zh: 演讲; 会议; 作报告

examination_example.sentence: This free app provides more than 700 <highlight>talks</highlight> from the world's most famous thinkers, leaders and artists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个免费的应用程序提供了来自世界上最著名的思想家、领导人和艺术家的 700 多场演讲。

examination_example.sentence: Why does the speaker give the <highlight>talk</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 演讲者为什么要发表演讲？

examination_example.sentence: If you are interested, please attend the <highlight>talk</highlight> on time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果您有兴趣，请准时参加讲座。

sense_info_list.en: have the power or ability of speech

examination_example.sentence: The third day, he could <highlight>talk</highlight> fine, but he listened and raised his hand to speak.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第三天，他能好好地说话了，但他依旧聆听然后举手说话。

word_usage.usage: talk作名词“交谈，聊天”时，常用于单数形式，可与不定冠词a连用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，多指与人交谈时的连续说话，也可指单方面的较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活的动作而不侧重内容。
最普通用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的具体内容。
侧重于说话的动作本身，着重说话的能力而非内容。可指长篇演讲，也可指三言两语的交谈，或指简单的开口发声说话。
较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
普通用词，指将某事向某人讲述或转述，有时含嘱托、命令之意，口语或书面语均可用。
